subject: Suits and Litigation

Preakness Stakes
Frauds and Swindling
Fen-Phen (Drug Combination)
lead_paragraph: A judge has given the more than 400 plaintiffs in a diet-drug lawsuit the right to 20 percent of the proceeds from the future sale of the Preakness Stakes and the Breeders’ Cup Classic champion.
snippet: A judge has given the more than 400 plaintiffs in a diet-drug lawsuit the right to 20 percent of the proceeds from the future sale of the Preakness Stakes and the Breeders’ Cup Classic champion.
